languages.text: "Та ячейка бунтовщиков и все их схроны были уничтожены, я об этом позаботилась. Однако вы правы, тревожная вероятность того, что они были связаны с Немезитом, мне тоже пришла на ум".

"That mutineer cell and all their secret stockpiles were destroyed. I made sure of it. Nevertheless, you are right, and the same troubling thought has crossed my mind: they could have been connected to Nemesite."
languages.original_text: "Та ячейка бунтовщиков и все их схроны были уничтожены, я об этом позаботилась. Однако вы правы, тревожная вероятность того, что они были связаны с Немезитом, мне тоже пришла на ум".

traits.locale_text: "That mutineer cell and all their secret stockpiles were destroyed, I made sure of it. Nevertheless, you are right. The same troubling thought has crossed my mind: they could have been connected to Nemesite."

"That mutineer cell and all their secret stockpiles were destroyed, I made sure of it. Nevertheless, you are right. The same troubling thought has crossed my mind: they could have been connected to Nemesite."

"That mutineer cell and all their secret stockpiles were destroyed. I made sure of it. Nevertheless, you are right, and the same troubling thought has crossed my mind: they could have been connected to Nemesite."

languages.text: «Hemos acabado con los amotinados y todas sus reservas secretas, me he asegurado de ello. Aunque tiene razón, yo he pensado lo mismo: podrían estar conectados con Nemesitio».
languages.original_text: "That mutineer cell and all their secret stockpiles were destroyed. I made sure of it. Nevertheless, you are right, and the same troubling thought has crossed my mind: they could have been connected to Nemesite."

traits.locale_text: «Hemos acabado con los amotinados y todas sus reservas secretas, me he asegurado de ello. Aunque tiene razón, yo he pensado lo mismo: podrían estar conectados con Nemesitio».

languages.text: 「反逆者の拠点と隠し貯蔵品はすべて片付けています。この目で確認しました。とはいえ、あなた様の仰る通り、私にも同様の不安が頭を過っています。反逆者はネメサイトと通じている可能性があると」
languages.original_text: "That mutineer cell and all their secret stockpiles were destroyed. I made sure of it. Nevertheless, you are right, and the same troubling thought has crossed my mind: they could have been connected to Nemesite."

traits.locale_text: 「反逆者の拠点と隠し貯蔵品はすべて片付けています。この目で確認しました。とはいえ、あなた様の仰る通り、私にも同様の不安が頭を過っています。反逆者はネメサイトと通じている可能性があると」

languages.text: “我们消灭了那些叛乱分子，摧毁了他们所有的秘密物资，这一点我非常肯定。不过，您说的对，我的脑海里也同样闪过了这个令人不安的念头——这些人说不定和涅墨斯特有关。”
languages.original_text: "That mutineer cell and all their secret stockpiles were destroyed. I made sure of it. Nevertheless, you are right, and the same troubling thought has crossed my mind: they could have been connected to Nemesite."

traits.locale_text: “我们消灭了那些叛乱分子，摧毁了他们所有的秘密物资，这一点我非常肯定。不过，您说的对，我的脑海里也同样闪过了这个令人不安的念头——这些人说不定和涅墨斯特有关。”

languages.text: "Die Meuterer und ihre geheimen Lager wurden zerstört. Dafür habe ich gesorgt. Aber Ihr habt recht. Auch ich hatte diesen beunruhigenden Gedanken bereits. Sie könnten mit Nemesit in Verbindung gestanden haben."
languages.original_text: "That mutineer cell and all their secret stockpiles were destroyed. I made sure of it. Nevertheless, you are right, and the same troubling thought has crossed my mind: they could have been connected to Nemesite."

traits.locale_text: "Die Meuterer und ihre geheimen Lager wurden zerstört. Dafür habe ich gesorgt. Aber Ihr habt recht. Auch ich hatte diesen beunruhigenden Gedanken bereits. Sie könnten mit Nemesit in Verbindung gestanden haben."

languages.text: « Cette cellule de mutins et tout le matériel qu'ils avaient accumulé en secret ont été anéantis. J'y ai veillé personnellement. Cependant, vous n'avez pas tort, et la même pensée troublante m'a traversé l'esprit : ils auraient très bien pu être de mèche avec Némésite. »
languages.original_text: "That mutineer cell and all their secret stockpiles were destroyed. I made sure of it. Nevertheless, you are right, and the same troubling thought has crossed my mind: they could have been connected to Nemesite."

traits.locale_text: « Cette cellule de mutins et tout le matériel qu'ils avaient accumulé en secret ont été anéantis. J'y ai veillé personnellement. Cependant, vous n'avez pas tort, et la même pensée troublante m'a traversé l'esprit : ils auraient très bien pu être de mèche avec Némésite. »

languages.text: "O isyancı hücresi, tüm gizli zulalarıyla birlikte yok edildi. Garanti ederim. Yine de haklısınız. Aynı rahatsız edici düşünce benim de aklımdan geçti. Nemezit'le bağlantıları olabilir."
languages.original_text: "That mutineer cell and all their secret stockpiles were destroyed. I made sure of it. Nevertheless, you are right, and the same troubling thought has crossed my mind: they could have been connected to Nemesite."
